thread.section_title: eSpares.co.uk Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.espares.co.uk
thread.title: Kevin Yates

author: Kevin Yates
title: Kevin Yates
text:
Easy, straight forward shopping experience. Easy to find the item I wanted and delivered to me the very next day.
I purchased a pressure washer gun for my Bosch pressure washer when my original gun started leaking. The replacement purchased was a genuine Bosch part, brand new.
There is a vast amount of spares available at espares and I won't hesitate to be back when I need any other spare parts in the future.
